plugins.name: cc10x
plugins.description: cc10x v2: Skills-first architecture with ONE master orchestrator skill + 11 sub-agents + 18 domain skills. /review (5-star working AI agents), 4 systematic workflows via orchestrator. Features: 'What Could Go Wrong?' risk analysis, Complexity Assessment, File Manifests, Rollback/Deployment strategies. Real 65-79% progressive loading savings. Honest: 3-20x MORE tokens than manual, use for complexity 4-5. Follows official Anthropic patterns.
